messageBody:
JUnit goes to great lengths to make tests independent of each other.
Possibly this makes it more thread safe as well.

Has anyone considered or written a multithreaded test runner? Given the
amount of time my tests spend waiting for the network or doing I/O, not
to mention the benefits of true multiprocessor system, I wouldn't be
surprised if running multiple tests in parallel could cut execution time
in half or more.

In the most extreme case I've encountered, the full test suite takes
couple of hours to run. However, that's almost all spent waiting for the
network, so it would be extremely parallelizable. Has anyone done this?

--
